column1: tossed up, he drives to long on
short on middle, he's back and whipping this to deep midwicket
shorter outside off, he creates room and crashes a cut shot past point! Nice footwork to create the room
full on leg, he skips out and whips to deep midwicket
short and wide, he hammers a cut straight to cover-point
tossed up, on middle, he defends on the front foot
shorter length, he tries to pull and gets a bottom edge onto pad
good length on off, he pushes forward straight of mid off for a single
beaten and it nips over off! He tried to drive on the up, it nipped back through the gate but went over off
crushed flat over cover! Length ball but wide, he freed the arms and slapped it like a rocket over cover!
good length, top of off, he defends into the off side to pinch one
good length, top of off, he defends to backward point
low full toss, he drives to cover and gets one
tossed up, driven to long on
Bowled him! 97kph, arm ball gets through! This was fired in on a good length, he tries to square drive on the up, misses and loses his off stump!
pushed across him, he flashes and misses
fuller on middle, he pushes back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, he reverse sweeps to backward point
shorter length, some turn, he's back and mistiming a cut to point
good length, he skips down but not to the pitch and defends on the up
top edged sweep falls safe behind square. He swept a good length and wasn't in control but the man at short fine couldn't get to it
launched over long off! He skipped out, nowhere near the pitch but just swung through the line and hammered it flat over the rope
a brilliant reverse paddle! Slip came out after the previous shot and he set up early to paddle it reverse through the vacant slip and gets rewarded with four
tries to reverse paddle again but misses
beaten trying to run a close ball to off to third man
angled down leg and he glances this easily off the pads for four! Fine leg was up and that was too straight
fuller on leg, he pushes to a vacant midwicket
good length across the left hander, he drives on the up to point

caught at short fine leg trying to scoop fine! Good length outside off, he stepped outside off premeditating a scoop over fine leg, he got it off the toe of the bat and it ballooned straight to O'Keefe on the circle. Simple catch
good length, pushed to midwicket, a run out chance is on but Silk's throw is a shocker! His underarm stuck in his hands and went 10m over the stumps

caught and bowled! A leading edge pops back to Lyon and he takes a great catch diving forward. Heazlett closed the face trying to work square against the turn and bounce, it popped off the leading edge back to the bowler, Lyon dived forward and took and excellent catch
tossed up outside off, he whips to midwicket with the turn
darted down the leg side, some turn but it's a wide
shorter length, he's back and defending to cover
tossed up, on off, he works with the turn to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and whipping this to forward square
shorter length, he's back and working this behind square
beaten by a cracking leg cutter! That seamed a mile from back of a length
short outside off, he is back and smacking a powerful pull forward of square, Silk works hard on the rope to make the save. A brilliant save from Silk

caught at mid on! Smith takes it! Short outside off, he trying to just roll a pull shot forward of square, gets a top edge that floats up to mid on and Smith camps under it to take a very simple catch
back of a length outside off, he's back and guiding this to third man, using the pace to run it fine of the man
back of a length, he punches off the back foot to cover
shorter length outside off, he's back and angling it to third man comfortably
shorter length, he's back and whipping this through square
shorter length, he's back and tucking this off the hip
shorter down leg, he pulls and gets a little bottom edge off the glove and is dropped by Philippe! Tough chance. But it's called wide?! Terrible call
shorter he pulls behind square
short on the hip, he tucks it around the corner
shorter, he stands up and punches to long on
tossed up outside off, he clips with the turn to midwicket
tossed up outside off, he drives firmly to deep cover
tossed up outside off, he steps out to defend
shorter length, he square drives on the up to deep point
tossed up, he drives firmly wide of long off for a couple
shorter on leg, he's back and working this forward of square
tossed up on off, he drives against the turn to long on
shot and wide and cut beautifully with the angled past backward point! Good shot.
back of a length on off, he's back and defending
shorter on the hip, he tries to pull but gets hit on the thigh pad
good length wide of off, slower ball, he tries to cut but misses. It was too close to cut
shorter length angled in, he gets an inside edge onto thigh pad

Bowled him! Brilliant off cutter slower ball! This gripped sharply and hit the top of off! Angled in, he played the wrong line, it gripped off in the pitch, nipped slowly beating the outside edge as he defended and off stump was lit up
shorter length on off, he's back and turning this behind square
shorter length, he defends from the crease to point
shorter length, he's back and taken on the thigh guard, it rolls to third man
shorter length, he's back and running this to third man
fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
good length wide of off, he leaves
shorter length, he's back and pulling forward of square
shorter length, off break, he's back and defending to midwicket
shorter length on leg, he tucks this to short fine
shorter length, he's back giving room punching against the turn to long off
pushed through quicker, he tries to pull, gets an inside edge onto pad trying to pull
quicker on leg, he's back and working this behind square
good length wide of off, he square drives with supreme timing to deep point
slower ball leg cutter, he's defending to backward point
shorter leg cutter, he's back and pulling this behind square to the gap
good length, fourth stump line, he defends to cover
good length outside off, he drives on the up to cover
fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
full down leg, he glances with the angle wide of fine leg for a couple
angled down leg and called wide
hammered past backward point! He gets some width and seizes on it
angled into middle, he clips this with the angle forward of square
good length wide of off, he mistimes a square drive getting an inside edge onto pad
short ball, he hammers a pull to the man at backward square
short and wide, he cuts hard to wide third man and O'Keefe misfields on the rope! He got there but bobbled it into the rope as he dived full stretch
tossed up outside off, he drives to deep cover
tossed up, he drives to cover
short and wide, he cuts firmly to deep point
shorter length, he punches this over cover with a helicopter type flourish, quality shot for two
short and wide, he cuts hard to deep point
darted in, some turn, he defends to cover
angled into leg, he drives firmly to long on
he backs away, Curran follows with a yorker and he jams the bat down to dig it out
angled down leg, he tries to glance fine, it comes off glove and bounces to Philippe

caught at deep point! Brilliant catch from Vince! They are checking this for a bump ball but it travelled 50m. It's out. It was very full outside off, he square drives and he just chips a half volley slicing it high to deep point, Vince runs in a fair way and takes an excellent catch!
good length on leg, he's tucking this behind square to the circle and they run well for two
short ball outside off, he takes on the pull shot, miscues off the top edge but it lands safely short of deep midwicket
full outside off, he tries to heave down the ground and drags it to long on
good length, on off, he's back and chopping this off the bottom edge towards third man

caught at long on! Slower ball, he picks it, stands up and tries to loft to the sightscreen but he mistimes it, dragging it down to long on and Smith takes the catch running along the rope. Good catch. He managed the rope well
good length on off, he defends on the front foot
short and wide, he hammers a cut to deep point
shorter length, slower ball, angled in, he tucks it behind square
caught at deep midwicket! Again it's Smith. Length slower ball, he tried to loft to the long boundary with three men back and just hits catching practice for Smith. He took it easily 20m off the rope
full down leg, way down and called wide
short and wide, he's back and cutting firmly to deep point
length ball, on off, he pushes this towards long on
fuller slower ball, he square drives to deep point
slower ball, angled down leg and called wide
back of a length, on middle, he's back and tucking this to midwicket
good length wide of off, he square drives to deep cover-point
pulled powerfully through square leg beating the sweepers! Good shot. It was a short ball that followed him, he backed away and clubbed into the gap at the long boundary
length ball, he backs away and hammers this to long on
slower ball, he defends into the off side
launched over long off! Slower ball, length outside off, mid off is up, he backs away and swings through the line smoking it over the man at mid off and all the way
full yorker angled into the pads, it rolls off pad to short fine. They opt not to run
angled into leg, he swings hard and gets a thick inside edge that runs behind square, Silk is forced to dive on the rope and makes another save! They do check it and it's close but he saves two.
slower ball, length, he just knocks this into the leg side for a single to get Pattinson on strike
full wide yorker and the umpire deems it's outside the wide line
full slower ball, he mistimes this to cover and they don't run. Pattinson wants the strike
full wide yorker, he drives to mid off and now they run a single
low full toss, he drives to long off
launched over midwicket! What a shot! Curran banged it in, he charged and stood tall to hammer this over the fence! Incredible shot
slower ball, he slaps this to long off and they run well for two
darted into middle, he whips to midwicket
tossed up, he drives to long on
darted into leg, he whips to midwicket
angled down leg, he flips a paddle sweep over short fine! Skilful shot as that strayed down leg
shorter length, he stands up and punches to cover
shorter length, he tries to pull and is taken on the thigh pad
back of a length on off, he's back and working this forward of square
angled into the hip, he glances this straight to short fine
shorter length, on leg, some pace and bounce, he's jumping back to knock it behind square
back of a length, 146kph, fourth stump, he defends into the off side and they pinch one
back of a length on off, he stands up and pushes to mid off
chest high short ball, he crunches a pull shot along the ground but only gets one. The best struck single of the night.
he backs away and lofts this inside out just wide of mid off into the gap, wasn't well timed but they get two
slog swept to deep midwicket! Full in the slot, he picked the carrom ball and smashed it
half volley, driven powerfully wide of mid off! Quicker ball and he used the pace playing a textbook drive
good length outside off, he defends to cover
floated up slower, he eases a glorious cover drive, just a push and it runs away! What an incredible shot. He just lent on it
darted down leg, he tries to paddle sweep but is taken on the pad
angled down leg, 138kph, Peirson can't glove it, it runs aways and it's given byes! It was tight to leg as he shuffled a long way across
fuller on leg, he clips this to midwicket
fuller on middle, he pushes to mid on and they run as he's deep
shorter length, he pulls powerfully behind square but just for one
slower ball, on leg, it comes off inside edge onto pad and rolls away, Vince is called through, Labuschagne shies and just misses! He would have been out!
angled into middle, he's back and clipping this behind square to the sweeper
back of a length, 120kph, wide of off, he drives on the up wide of mid off
shorter length, he pulls nicely behind square to the sweeper
shorter length, he pulls through square leg to the sweeper
backs away early, Cutting follows, he tucks this behind square
shorter length, he hammers a pull but straight to the protection at deep midwicket
length ball, outside off, he drives on the up to cover
good length, top of off, he mistimes a drive
good length, skidding through outside off, he misses trying to drive on the up
back of a length, wider, he leans back and late cuts beautifully wide of short third man threading the gap!
good length middle, he works this forward of square off the front foot to deep square
cracking pull shot beats deep midwicket! What a shot. Chest high short ball and he thumped it. Vince is imperious touch
angled down leg, he glances this neatly fine to the rope! So skilful just turning the bottom hand to place it fine
tossed up outside off, he skips out and drives inside out to deep point
shorter length, he's back and working this to midwicket
fuller leg break, he whips against the turn past midwicket wide of mid on
skidding down leg, he glances this to short fine
attempted sweep from outside off, an appeal for lbw, but he was miles outside the line
full on leg, he sweeps hard to deep square leg
full on leg, he drives easily to long on
top spinner on off, he pushes back to the bowler
advances and launches this over long on into the stands! Glorious. Quicker ball but full, he's down in a flash and it was a beautiful swing of the bat
quicker and shorter wide of off, he misses trying to cut
shorter length, he's back and working this to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and punching this to deep cover-point
shorter leg break, he slices a cut in the air and it finds the gap backward of point! Wasn't controlled but everything is finding the gap
fuller on off, he pushes back to the bowler
slower leg break, he sits back and punches a cut to deep point
advances and lofts this towards long off but it lands just short of the man running in. AB couldn't get there
quicker leg break, bounces and he misses a cut shot
short ball way down leg and called wide. Good take by Peirson. He appealed to try and con the umpire but it was a wide
lofted flat over cover! The fieldsman was diving but it was well clear of him. Super shot.
good length slower ball, he defends into the off side for an easy single
fuller outside off, he leans on a drive to cover
shorter length slower ball, he pulls behind square
slower ball on leg, he chips this forward of square for a single

brilliant catch from Heazlett at deep square! Length ball on leg, he flicks it off the hip high to deep square, Heazlett is in off the long boundary, he's forced to backpedal as it carries a long way but he takes a superb catch above his head and balances himself before running into the rope.
full on leg, he whips this firmly to deep midwicket
fired straight, tries to revers paddle it but bunts it off the glove
quicker off break, he's back and chopping this to cover-point
fired way down the leg side for a wide
fuller on off, he defends on the front foot
shorter length, he's back and punching to deep cover-point
carrom ball, on middle, he pushes this to deep cover-point
angled down leg, he glances to short fine
full on leg, he clips this neatly off his pads to deep square leg
launched over long on! Full ball in the slot and he cleared the front leg and swung through the line beautifully
clipped neatly wide of mid on and it goes all the way! Lovely conventional shot. Full toss and he just clips it wide of the man in the ring
fuller outside off and he drives neatly to deep cover
slower ball, he tries to get down on one knee to sweep but gets taken on the body for a leg bye
full outside off, he steers this to backward point
shorter length, he's back and whipping this to midwicket
he charges at a shorter length, has to adjust and chop it short third man
tossed up and he hammers a drive against the spin straight of mid on! Superb shot. Smith would have enjoyed that
shorter length, he's back and punching this wide of cover
tossed up, he skips down and stays leg side to loft this flat down the ground over the bowler's head! Held his shape well and executed
full outside off, he drives powerfully to deep cover-point
lofted over cover-point and there is no one back! It was full outside off, he backs away and lofts this high over cover-point with ease using the extra pace
he backs away, Pattinson follows, he clips this through forward square to the gap for two
there is the bouncer and it's too high and called wide
yorker, angled into leg, he jams this out and they pinch a single
short outside off, he's back and late cutting to third man
he backs away, Pattinson follows, hits him on the thigh pad and they get a leg bye
caught behind! Some extra pace and bounce. Bizarre dismissal. He backed away, Pattinson followed at the body and Smith got in a tangle, caught in two minds and ended up edging it to Peirson
leg break outside off, it turns, he tries to sweep, misses, taken on the body and it runs for a leg bye
shorter length, he punches this off the back foot to cover
fuller on middle, he drives off a thick inside edge through square leg
shorter length, he's back and defending
shorter length, he's back and forcing to deep cover-point
advances and lofts superbly inside out over cover, Heazlett reels this in on the rope but they run three. 50 for Philippe. Great stroke to bring it up
angled down leg, it comes off pad for a leg bye
cracking bouncer and he ducks late
short into the ribs, he tries to pull and gets it off the toe to midwicket
a huge appeal for lbw but the umpire turns it down. It looked really close. Might have just been sliding
full on leg, he flicks this forward of square for the winning runs
